summary_promot:

img_summary: The image displays a close-up of an in-game item resembling a carved stone or bone object. It features a rectangular shape with rounded ends and a hole at one end, possibly for attachment or use. The object appears to have engraved or embossed details, suggesting it might be a collectible or a key item within the game. There are no visible characters, enemies, or UI components in the image, indicating the focus is solely on this item. Its design suggests it could be of cultural or historical significance within the game's narrative or environment.
